channel.title: Brancha Blog
channel.description: Insights and advice for service business owners on building a strong online presence and growing their business.

item.title: Customers Compared You With Others Before Calling
item.description: People checked multiple businesses online and chose the one that felt clearer and more trustworthy.

item.title: Customers Wanted WhatsApp But Could Not Find It
item.description: People preferred messaging but only phone calls were available.
